summary: Integrate test server into the PHP SDK testing framework, similar to implementations in Java and TypeScript SDKs. This would provide a standardized way to test Temporal workflows without requiring a full server setup.
userImpact: Developers can more easily test Temporal workflows in the PHP SDK with a lightweight test server, improving the testing experience and consistency across SDKs.
proposedFix: Implement test server integration following the patterns established in the Java SDK (temporal-test-server) and TypeScript SDK (PR #543).
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented in the PHP SDK testing framework following the established patterns from other SDKs.
